name: Turkey NFT
description: Unique NFT Turkey. The base is made of the famous Sultanite gemstone from Turkey. The Sultanate came to Europe with the Turks, the founders of the powerful Ottoman Empire. The edges are made of pure silver. It was used to make the rings of 2 great sultans: Mehmed the Conqueror and Suleiman the Magnificent. The stand is made of Damascus ceramics, on a podsavka in the center stands and turns with the help of a mechanism a glass of Murano glass for brewing tea in Turkey "armudu". Four Dervishes circle around the edges. The reverse depicts the golden image of the famous Hagia Sophia Mosque.
